meanings.sent2: I learned about sputniks in school.
meanings.sent3: The sputniks had a space party in orbit.
meanings.sent4: The sputniks in the sky winked at us.
meanings.sent5: The bright sputniks lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: A series of Soviet artificial satellites.
meanings.sent1: The sputniks launched one by one.
meanings.sent3: The sputniks held a race in space.
meanings.sent4: The sputniks formed a glowing chain in orbit.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sputniks painted the sky.
